text: Dwight Eversley Yorke CM (born 3 November 1971) is a retired Trinidadian football player. He has played for Trinidad and Tobago national team. He won the 1998–99 Premier League Golden Boot, along side Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink and Michael Owen. This made him the joint first foreign Golden Boot winner. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== :Source: Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Europe
